localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Don't keep your audience waiting for a follow-up email! Sharing slides or resources has never been easier. Upload your content, add your custom QR code to any presentation and streamline sharing. ****Currently free for all early access users****
nodes.title: Slideshare - Share presentations and resources, easily
nodes.author: James Quinn

nodes.excerpt: Think of Speeko like a gym membership for your voice. Get instant feedback on your speaking style, and track your progress over time. Personalized activities help you build new skills in just 5 minutes a day. You'll be speaking with confidence in no time!
nodes.title: Speeko - A.I. powered public speaking and presenter coach
nodes.author: Nico Aguilar

nodes.excerpt: Collecting binding e-signatures is a hassle. Etch e-sign free simplifies this process to three easy steps: upload a PDF, choose up to two signers, and send a signature request for free. Signers can review and sign documents from anywhere on any device.
nodes.title: Etch E-Sign Free - Simple, intuitive and binding e-signatures, absolutely free
nodes.author: Mang-Git Ng

nodes.excerpt: Spaceman is an application for macOS that allows you to view your Spaces in the menu bar. Spaceman allows you to see which space you are currently on relative to the other spaces you have. Naming these spaces is also an option.
nodes.title: Spaceman - A macOS app to view virtual desktops in the menu bar
nodes.author: Jay

nodes.excerpt: Distributed is a new live social chat app to help remote teams stay in sync. It started off as a jamstack demo but after spending 2-3 hours on it every day we realised it filled a huge hole in our work life as we all went remote.
nodes.title: Distributed - Stay in sync with friends, family and colleagues
nodes.author: Asim Aslam

nodes.excerpt: Listen to music with friends while you work. Soundcloud and Youtube supported.
nodes.title: haminet.fm - Listen to music with your friends while working

nodes.excerpt: KanbanTab is the ideal default tab to help you efficiently organize tasks and build the momentum to get things done! This tool is completely free with no ads and requires no registration.

nodes.title: Sleepedy - Track and improve sleep with a personal sleep coach

nodes.excerpt: I am a forgetful person. Many times after I open my MacBook and scan some news, I totally forget what I initially try to accomplish. I want to build a simple tool to display my current goal on the menu bar
nodes.title: One Goal - Makes your goal more visible by showing it on the menu bar
nodes.author: timqian

nodes.excerpt: Social Web Suite is a powerful, easy to use, efficient, and intelligent social media management tool that helps small business owners, bloggers, social media managers, agencies, and enterprises save time, increase productivity, and get better business results.
nodes.title: Social Web Suite - Set it and forget it social media perfected
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: tabExtend helps you manage your tabs. The browser extension replaces your new tab with an overview where you can create groups containing your tabs, notes, and text-snippets. Visually organize it all with ease using drag and drop and handy shortcuts.
nodes.title: tabExtend - Easily save tabs and quickly create notes in your browser
nodes.author: Gabe Ragland

nodes.title: Community Weekly - Learn to grow and monetize your community

nodes.excerpt: Get more attention to your videos by adding headlines, captions, and call-to-action and increase your interaction on social media. Also, turn your video meetings into highlights â€“ everything online in your browser.

nodes.excerpt: Brightful LIVE for Clubhouse is a collection of essential features that help your Clubhouse rooms standout amongst the rest. Visualize your ideas by drawing on the Whiteboard, while engaging listeners with Q&As and Polls.
nodes.title: Whiteboard, Q&A, and Polls for Clubhouse - Supercharge your clubhouse room and differentiate your talk
nodes.author: Nichole Elizabeth DeMerÃ©

nodes.excerpt: WeHatePasswords is a Google Chrome extension that replaces all password fields with easy to remember pixel art. Gone are the days of remembering complicated passwords. Simply draw to log in. Compatible with password managers.
nodes.title: WeHatePasswords 2.0 - You hate passwords. That's where we come in.
nodes.author: Dalton Edwards

nodes.excerpt: Forky is a mind-mapping tool that is distraction free, with a minimal feature set. â€¢ colorful bubble and line diagrams â€¢ real-time collaboration â€¢ easy and quick to use â€¢ no distractions Web app in beta. Mobile coming soon!
nodes.title: Forky - A minimalistic and distraction-free approach to mind-mapping
nodes.author: Daniel Sont

nodes.excerpt: A new iOS and iPadOS with personal advice, goal tracking, meditation scenes, daily motivation and more.
nodes.title: Better Year App - Make 2021 a better year: personal advice, goals & meditation
nodes.author: Cristian Moisei

nodes.excerpt: Plan your day, week and month in Notion.
nodes.title: Notion Planners - Plan your day, week and month in Notion

nodes.excerpt: Teach without videos and zoom sessions. We enable best minds to share their knowledge in minutes. Average time to launch a course is 2 months. Launch your course under 2 minutes with Questbook. What Twitter has done to blogging, Questbook does to learning.
nodes.title: QuestBook - The fastest way to teach and learn
